shortDescription: The Protect WP Admin WordPress plugin before 4.0 discloses the URL of the admin panel via a redirection of a crafted URL, bypassing the protection offered.
vulnerabilityName: wp-experts protect_wp_admin URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
